function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Short-term compliance due to low impact of costs and negative emotions","Impact":"Decrease in compliance as the measures stay in place longer or if lifted and reinstituted","Mitigation":"Increase awareness of long-term costs, provide support for negative emotions, and adjust measures to address compliance challenges","Technologies":"Behavioral analytics for emotion detection, adaptive policy frameworks, public communication platforms","People":"General population, policymakers, mental health professionals","Owner":"Government, public health organizations, mental health organizations"},{"Description":"Individual differences in compliance based on impulsiveness","Impact":"Decreased compliance among impulsive individuals","Mitigation":"Implement measures to make it harder to avoid compliance (e.g., physical barriers, removal of temptations)","Technologies":"Public space monitoring, smart city infrastructure, urban design with compliance in mind","People":"General population, urban planners, local authorities","Owner":"Local government, city planning organizations"},{"Description":"Challenges in achieving minimum certainty of punishment for violating COVID-19 measures","Impact":"Difficulty in deterring non-compliance through punishment","Mitigation":"Exploring alternative strategies for increasing compliance, focusing on prevention and education","Technologies":"Predictive analytics for non-compliance identification, educational platforms, community engagement tools","People":"Law enforcement, policymakers, community leaders","Owner":"Government, community organizations"}]}
